tool_description: Validates sentiment analysis results against ground truth data or human annotations to assess model performance and accuracy.
error_messages: Array length mismatch: Predicted sentiments and ground truth must have same length.
Insufficient data: Provide at least 5 samples for meaningful validation.
Invalid sentiment labels: Use consistent sentiment labels (positive, negative, neutral).
Invalid confidence scores: All confidence scores must be between 0.0 and 1.0.
Confidence array mismatch: Confidence scores array length must match predictions if provided.
usage: Input predicted sentiment results and corresponding ground truth labels. Optionally provide confidence scores. Returns validation metrics and performance analysis.

f1_score.description: F1 score combining precision and recall

confusion_matrix.description: Confusion matrix summary showing classification results

performance_summary.description: Summary of model performance and recommendations
